Plan: 1 to add, 1 to drop.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to add
  privileges: 1 to drop

Tables:
  + secrets

Privileges:
  - reader

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS secrets (
    id integer,
    data text,
    CONSTRAINT secrets_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

REVOKE SELECT ON TABLE secrets FROM reader;
